channel.title: nsx-v on Marco Kwak
channel.description: Recent content in nsx-v on Marco Kwak

item.title: NSX Data Center Edition Comparison
item.description: What is NSX Data Center? You always use Network to access to the Internet. If you didn’t go to a place without Internet connection like an island, you are technically living with Networks; Wifi, mobile cellular data, routers to provide wifi at home, etc. But I had not thought of Network as a computing resource before joining VMware. Even my previous company was one of wireless network hardware vendor, Ruckus Network, but my exposure to Networking was limited.
